castVoteD2(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint2.details: D2 Quadratic Vote - Cost = numVotes^2 (BURNS credits)

getAvailableCredits(address).details: Get available credits for a user

mintTestTokens(uint256).details: Mint test tokens for demo purposes (anyone can call)

onApprove(address,address,uint256,bytes).details: Callback for TON's approveAndCall - enables single-transaction voting Called by TON token contract after user approves spending

params.amount: The amount of TON approved (in wei)
params.data: Encoded vote parameters: (proposalId, commitment, numVotes, creditsSpent, nullifier, pA, pB, pC)
params.owner: The user who approved the tokens
